original_title: ピリオド打ったらカタルシス
overview: NEW QUBE, a video platform used by 1 billion people. Hiro and Hide of the annoying NEW QUBE are only thinking about the number of views and becoming famous. The two of them start to commit criminal acts and distribute videos in order to get more views, but ... A story that goes crazy with the desire for approval and SNS in the modern society.
title: Catharsis After the End
